overview: Those expecting a "CSI: Crime Scene Investigation"-style romp into criminology and forensics, be warned. This gritty, cum-soaked portrayal of police work in the Czech Republic concentrates solely on the long cock (rather than the arm!) of the law. If you like officers in uniform fucking the confessions out of young and disarmingly cute na’er-do-wells, then this will be a wank-fest extraordinaire!
title: Raw Cops
